net.jbouchard.bool
Class Brackets

java.lang.Object
  net.jbouchard.bool.Brackets

public class Brackets
extends Object

A utility class to work with brackets in Boolean expressions.

Version:
0.1 Beta
Author:
Chris Bouchard

isBracketPair

public static boolean isBracketPair(String open,
                                    String close)
Return true if open and close are a matching pair of open and close brackets, respectively, else false.

Parameters:
open - the open bracket to evaluate
close - the close bracket to evaluate
Returns:
true if open and close are a matching pair of brackets, else false
